channel.title: Mango RSPS || Oldschool || 24/7 || Nostalgic || Skill/Pk/Pvm || Stable
channel.description:
[center][url=http://mangorsps.freeforums.org/portal.php][IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/zvbzn8.png[/img][/url][/center]
[center][u][b]Click below to download the new client v2.1![/b][/u] [url=https://www.mediafire.com/?e8pvg23flwj15p2]Download Client v2.1[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/6atpetogsvxm/Mango_Client_V2.1.rar]Mirror Client v2.1[/url] [url=http://www.mangorsps.com/site/webclient]Play Now![/url]
[center][B]Owner/Developer[/B]: Zetto [B]Developer[/B]: Switch [B]Forums[/B]: [url=http://mangorsps.freeforums.org/portal.php]Click Here![/url][/center]
[B]Summary[/B] [spoiler] [center] Back in the day Runescape Private Servers were looked at differently. People played them for the uniqueness of the game, not for the newer revision items and animations. Nowadays that seems to be the only concept that captures a persons eye, that's pretty sad.. Don't get me wrong, there are tons of nicely programmed, and well managed servers out there; that I can't deny! Here at Mango we aim to encapsulate at least a small player base that enjoys the nostalgic feeling of the Delta days. Nonetheless I encourage everyone to try Mango out! [/center] [/spoiler]
[CENTER] [u][b][size=15pt]Server Content:[/size][/b][/u] [/CENTER]
○ [b]Many areas to visit[/b] ○ [b]All skills trainable[/b] ○ [b]Player vs Player and Player vs Monster[/b] ○ [b]Unique Skilling task system with point rewarding system[/b] ○ [b]Bosses to fight such as[/b]: [size=8pt][i]- King Black Dragon - Chaos Elemental - Kalphite Queen[/i][/size] ○ [b]Mini-games to play[/b]: [size=8pt][i]- Custom Assault Mini-game - Fight Pits - Barrows[/i][/size] ○ [b]Pk Points + Exchange store[/b] ○ [b]Slayer Points + Point store[/b] ○ [b]Skillcape Emotes[/b] ○ [b]Cool monster teleports[/b] ○ [b]474 emotes, items, and gfx added (Not all)[/b] ○ [b]Taverly Dungeon (More coming soon!)[/b] ○ [b]Delta 2-3 second attack lagg fixed.[/b] ○ [b]Every skill functional and levelable![/b]
[CENTER][u][b]Pictures[/b][/u][/CENTER]
[spoiler] [size=10pt][b]Basic server pictures[/b][/size] [spoiler] [center][IMG]http://i764.photobucket.com/albums/xx290/yobert30/Mobile%20Uploads/d5acaae9-0a19-4eb5-84f2-554649435e1c.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i764.photobucket.com/albums/xx290/yobert30/89bed15b-6bcc-4460-b5ab-ece961c80226.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i764.photobucket.com/albums/xx290/yobert30/1761ccf3-795a-45f8-9146-cead20a82ca1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i764.photobucket.com/albums/xx290/yobert30/d5c798cd-637d-49c4-b655-074e619178f2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i764.photobucket.com/albums/xx290/yobert30/35b92f0c-c20c-42fd-a6bf-304ba1505d76.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i764.photobucket.com/albums/xx290/yobert30/1dc0383e-d84b-4c89-987f-336bcf2bd7f6.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i764.photobucket.com/albums/xx290/yobert30/7ca29a10-40d1-4e29-9a47-f133e26113ba.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/x42fk1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/b4jga1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2426bds.png[/img][/spoiler]
[size=10pt][b]Pesky Delta Attack lagg fixed![/b][/size] [spoiler][IMG]http://i764.photobucket.com/albums/xx290/yobert30/AttackLagFixed-1.gif[/img][/spoiler] [/center]

item.title: Mango RSPS || Oldschool || 24/7 || Nostalgic || Skill/Pk/Pvm || Stable
item.dc:creator: @Shanks Shanks
item.description:
@Shanks wrote:

Weekly updates are here everyone! Come check them out!

[size=18pt]Donator only updates:[/size]

Dicing
[spoiler]○ Dedicated dicing zone, you can only dice inside this zone.
○ ::dicezone added (Donator+)[/spoiler]

[size=18pt]Normal game updates:[/size]

Smithing is here!!
[spoiler]○ You can now smelt all bars
○ You can smith bars into gold!

  • Bronze Bar (2.5k Each)
  • Iron Bar (5k Each)
  • Steel Bar (7.5k Each)
  • Mithril Bar (10k Each)
  • Adamantite Bar (12.5k Each)
  • Runite Bar (15k Each)[/spoiler]

Agility is here!!
[spoiler]○ Two new agility courses added

  • Gnome Agility
  • Barbarian course
    ○ Ticket reward system (No shop yet. I’ve got some good ideas though!)
    ○ You can train agility by talking to Pirate Jackie the fruit either at home,
    or the skilling area![/spoiler]

Nechyrael drops
[spoiler]○ Dragon boots added (4/100%)
○ Rune boots added (8/100%)
○ Rest of the drops are just added into a common drop table…[/spoiler]

Backup slayer task system & Task resetting!
[spoiler]○ You now have the option to reset your slayer task for 1 slayer point.
○ If you are stuck on a task and have no slayer points you can request a backup
task. Backup tasks are separate tasks that can be assigned to you if you
are stuck on a task and need more slayer points to reset it![/spoiler]

Game updates
[spoiler]○ You now don’t lose items or equipment when dying.
○ You still lose items and equipement when in the wilderness.
○ In some boss areas you will lose your items. (Gwd bosses…)[/spoiler]

I hope you enjoy this weeks updates! Come play at www.mangorsps.com!

~ Zetto

Read full topic
item.source: Mango RSPS || Oldschool || 24/7 || Nostalgic || Skill/Pk/Pvm || Stable

item.source: Mango RSPS || Oldschool || 24/7 || Nostalgic || Skill/Pk/Pvm || Stable

item.title: Mango RSPS || Oldschool || 24/7 || Nostalgic || Skill/Pk/Pvm || Stable
item.dc:creator: @Shanks Shanks
item.description:
@Shanks wrote:

Updates were a bit bland this week, but hey at least I’m still doing stuff! If you care to read them over then I’ve posted all updates I have done below!

Minigame
[spoiler]Barrows has been completely finished, before it was cheaply made and there was no way of obtaining items! I’ve added in the doors and the brothers. Not only do you spawn the brother but they also automatically attack you and nobody else, so have fun and get some good armor![/spoiler]

Shops
[spoiler]○ Monkfish added to Herquin
○ Mithril & Adamant gloves added to the melee shop.
○ Crafting store has been added - Next to fishing store at skilling.
○ Barrows and Dragon gloves were added to the Assault mini-game shop.[/spoiler]

Skills
[spoiler]○ Crafting is now a functional skill & you can now achieve 99![/spoiler]

Bug fixes
[spoiler]○ Maple, Yew, Magic shortbow, and Rune crossbow attack speeds were off so I fixed[/spoiler]

Drop updates
[spoiler]○ Mithril dragons were a bit in the beta stage, so I took the time to rebuff their drops, I took data from runewiki so I could get the drops as close as possible![/spoiler]

Please stay classy, and have good day!

 ~ Zetto

P.S Bump :3

Read full topic
item.source: Mango RSPS || Oldschool || 24/7 || Nostalgic || Skill/Pk/Pvm || Stable

item.title: Mango RSPS || Oldschool || 24/7 || Nostalgic || Skill/Pk/Pvm || Stable
item.dc:creator: @I_Smoke_Kush I Smoke Kush
item.description:
@I_Smoke_Kush wrote:

s[quote=“Shanks, post:7, topic:540368”][quote author=I Smoke Kush link=topic=659226.msg4413150#msg4413150 date=1394601267]
Great server, I recommend for delta players.
[/quote]

looking forward for new updates.

Weekly updates

[b]Training teleport completely redone[/b]

[spoiler]- You can now teleport to island training
- Mithril dragons
- Giants teleports
- You can get to Taverly dungeon by using the
ladder at home.[/spoiler]

[b]Ghetto Clan system added, but hey it's functional![/b]

[spoiler]- ::ccmake to create a clan
- ::ccjoin to join someone elses clan
- ::cm (Your message) to send a clan message![/spoiler]

[b]New items added (This is why client v2.1 is out..)[/b]

[spoiler]- Dragon boots (Dropped by barrelchest, Mithril dragons,
and the KBD)
- Fighter torso redone, it now looks like it should…
- New items added to skilling points exchange
○ Cavalier and mask
○ Animal masks (Cat, Bat, Sheep, and Wolf.)
○ Gnome scarf
- Nurmof now has hammers and Rune Axe’s[/spoiler]

[b]Some shops have been remade to benefit a players needs.[/b]

[spoiler]- Pk points exchange updated
○ Gilded set
○ Berserker, Warrior
Seer, and Archer rings added.
- Weapons shop adjustments
God books, ghostly robes,
initiate armor, team capes,
berserker and seers helm.
- Archer shop
Archer’s helm added.
- Infinity currency added.[/spoiler]

[b]Slayer has got some updates[/b]
	[spoiler]- The tasks are more directed toward the servers npc's.[/spoiler]

[b]Bug fixes[/b]

[spoiler]- Black defender required 70 ranged to equip it
That’s been fixed to work with attack and strength
- Dragon dagger went into shield spot… Lol
- Eating food had too long of a wait, so I fixed that.
- Fun Pk had some bugs[/spoiler]

[b]Next updates will consist of[/b]

[spoiler]- Barrows updated and fully functioning.
- A drop table (You will be able to see what drops what.)
- Giant mole boss
- Brimhaven, and Fremmy dungeons
(Had to remove them so i can program them in…)
- Custom God wars dungeon
(Until I get around to actually program the real one in…)
- Gambling
- Agility[/spoiler][/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Mango RSPS || Oldschool || 24/7 || Nostalgic || Skill/Pk/Pvm || Stable

item.title: Mango RSPS || Oldschool || 24/7 || Nostalgic || Skill/Pk/Pvm || Stable
item.dc:creator: @Shanks Shanks
item.description:
@Shanks wrote:

[center][/center]

[center]Click below to download the new client v2.1!
Download Client v2.1
Mirror Client v2.1
Play Now!

[center][B]Owner/Developer[/B]: Zetto
[B]Developer[/B]: Switch
[B]Forums[/B]: Click Here![/center]

[B]Summary[/B]
[spoiler]
[center]
Back in the day Runescape Private Servers were looked at differently. People played them for the uniqueness of the game, not for the newer revision items and animations. Nowadays that seems to be the only concept that captures a persons eye, that’s pretty sad… Don’t get me wrong, there are tons of nicely programmed, and well managed servers out there; that I can’t deny! Here at Mango we aim to encapsulate at least a small player base that enjoys the nostalgic feeling of the Delta days. Nonetheless I encourage everyone to try Mango out!
[/center]
[/spoiler]

[CENTER]
[size=15pt]Server Content:[/size]
[/CENTER]

○ Many areas to visit
○ All skills trainable
○ Player vs Player and Player vs Monster
○ Unique Skilling task system with point rewarding system
○ Bosses to fight such as:
[size=8pt][i]- King Black Dragon

  • Chaos Elemental
  • Kalphite Queen[/i][/size]
    ○ Mini-games to play:
    [size=8pt][i]- Custom Assault Mini-game
  • Fight Pits
  • Barrows[/i][/size]
    ○ Pk Points + Exchange store
    ○ Slayer Points + Point store
    ○ Skillcape Emotes
    ○ Cool monster teleports
    ○ 474 emotes, items, and gfx added (Not all)
    ○ Taverly Dungeon (More coming soon!)
    ○ Delta 2-3 second attack lagg fixed.
    ○ Every skill functional and levelable!

[CENTER]Pictures[/CENTER]

[spoiler]
[size=10pt]Basic server pictures[/size]
[spoiler]
[center]

[/spoiler]

[size=10pt]Pesky Delta Attack lagg fixed![/size]
[spoiler][/spoiler]
[/center]
